A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It absolutely baffles me how people think this movie is good. There are too many lazy plot holes and social messages that are too in your face to ignore. My initial issues after seeing the movie: 1. Leia flying through space - this was just absurd 2. Rey’s parentage reveal - I didn’t love this but can understand why they did it. It’s not a huge gripe of mine. 3. Snoke’s death/lack of backstory - offing Snoke like they did just makes him a completely worthless character in my eyes. Also just not acknowledging his backstory and where he cane from is just lazy. Sith lords don’t just appear out of thin air. 4. The entire ‘master code breaker’ storyline - this is one of the biggest issues. An absolute misery that this was allowed to be put on the screen. Utterly worthless\, only In the movie to hammer across the ‘force is for everyone’ message that was shoved down peoples’ throat. 5. The First Order waiting for resistance fuel to run out 6. No saber fight 7. Vice admiral not telling Poe about her plan 8. FO tracking ships through light speed 9.
